verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \nd Lord\nd* I waited \w and|strong="H1732"\w* waited, till, inclining \w to|strong="H1732"\w* me, \w he|strong="H1732"\w* heard \w my|strong="H1732"\w* cry.

\w From|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* horrible pit \w he|strong="H3068"\w* drew \w me|strong="H8085"\w*, up \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* miry clay; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* set \w my|strong="H8085"\w* feet \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rock, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* steps \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* firm.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* new song \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mouth, \w of|strong="H5921"\w* praise \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God. Many see \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w*, filled \w with|strong="H5921"\w* awe, \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd Lord\nd*.

\w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrought|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* rich measure, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* marvels \w and|strong="H3068"\w* purposes \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w* – \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* compare \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* – \w were|strong="H4009"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* declare \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* tell \w them|strong="H7760"\w*, past counting \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* bloody \w or|strong="H3068"\w* bloodless \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* delight, \w but|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* open ears \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*. Burnt-offering \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* sin \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* ask.
\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* said \w I|strong="H3808"\w*, ‘Here \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am, as \w the|strong="H3808"\w* roll \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* book has enjoined.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* delight, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* do \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5612"\w*, \w and|strong="H5612"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* law \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* heart.’

Well, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w you|strong="H6213"\w* know \w that|strong="H6213"\w*, \w with|strong="H6213"\w* lips unrestrained, \w your|strong="H6213"\w* righteousness \w I|strong="H8432"\w* \w told|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H6213"\w* congregation,

\w not|strong="H3808"\w* hiding \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H8193"\w*. \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* told \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* steadfast help, \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* hid \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* love \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* restrain, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H2617"\+w*\nd*, \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w pity|strong="H2617"\w* \w from|strong="H3820"\w* \w us|strong="H6666"\w*. \w Your|strong="H3808"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w* – \w ever|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3820"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w our|strong="H8432"\w* shield.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* evils \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* numbered \w have|strong="H3068"\w* compassed \w me|strong="H4480"\w* round. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* transgressions \w have|strong="H3068"\w* followed \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w up|strong="H3607"\w* – \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* bear \w it|strong="H5341"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w has|strong="H3068"\w* forsaken \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* 
d Lord
d*, \w be|strong="H3808"\w* pleased \w to|strong="H5704"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, haste \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w help|strong="H5800"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* 
d Lord
d*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* seeking \w my|strong="H3068"\w* life \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ashamed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* confounded together; \w may|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w delight|strong="H7521"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hurt \w be|strong="H3068"\w* defeated \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* dishonour.

\w May|strong="H5315"\w* \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* hurrah over \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* dumbfounded because \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* \w shame|strong="H3637"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* may \w all|strong="H5921"\w* who seek \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* rejoice \w and|strong="H8074"\w* be glad \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*. May \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* eager \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* aid, say, ‘Great \w is|strong="H8074"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd Lord\nd*’ evermore.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w weak|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* needy, \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* cares \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1245"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w help|strong="H8668"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* deliverer; don’t delay, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
